name: Just Chill (sulsadood)
description:
You just need to get to the end. It shouldn't be too much of a problem if you just chill.

5 premade Levels + Level Editor

Optional Nightmare and Jump Only mode

The level editor has an issue where if you paste in data from a previously created level you can't change it. I use the Godot engine and as far as I can tell the values are identical whether or not the data is pasted or created through the editor. I use stepify() on all floats to round them to the nearest 0.1 and I made sure that values that should be integers are cast to integers before being added to the world data. If you have any advice on what is causing this issue I would greatly appreciate it.
